item.title: How to prepare for data scientist interviews with an eCommerce company
item.description: Background I didn’t come up with any of those original contents. Here is just a summary of what I’ve summarized by learning from reading others’ insights in how data science contribute to the growth of eCommerce companies and what challenges we are faced with while working as a data scientist at the company. 5 Data Science Projects Every E-commerce Company Should Do In this article, the author talked about five important DS projects that should be undergoing at every eCommerce company.
